targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (
    SELECT
      count(*)
    FROM
      account
    WHERE
      balance > 0
  ) as holders_count,
  (
    SELECT
      sum(balance) / 1e18
    FROM
      account
    WHERE
      balance > 0
  ) as total_supply,
  (
    SELECT
      count(*)
    FROM
      transfer
  ) as transfers_count

SELECT
  type,
  count(*)
FROM
  account
WHERE
  balance > 0
GROUP BY
  type
ORDER BY
  count DESC

WITH bonded as (
  SELECT
    'WORKER' as type,
    sum(bond) / 1e18 as value
  FROM
    worker
  WHERE
    bond > 0
),
delegated as (
  SELECT
    'DELEGATION' as type,
    sum(deposit) / 1e18 as value
  FROM
    delegation
  WHERE
    deposit > 0
),
staked as (
  SELECT
    'PORTAL' as type,
    sum(amount) / 1e18 as value
  from
    gateway_stake
  WHERE
    amount > 0
),
balances as (
  SELECT
    type,
    sum(balance) / 1e18 as value
  FROM
    account
  WHERE
    balance > 0
  GROUP BY
    type
)
SELECT
  a.type,
  CASE
    WHEN a.type = 'USER' THEN a.value - b.value - d.value - s.value
    ELSE a.value
  END as value
FROM
  balances as a
  LEFT JOIN bonded as b ON a.type = 'USER'
  LEFT JOIN delegated as d ON a.type = 'USER'
  LEFT JOIN staked as s ON a.type = 'USER'
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  *
FROM
  bonded
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  *
FROM
  delegated
UNION
ALL
SELECT
  *
FROM
  staked
SELECT id as address, type, (balance) / 1e18 as balance FROM account WHERE balance > 0 ORDER BY balance DESC  LIMIT 100
SELECT coalesce(name, peer_id) as name, created_at FROM worker ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, type, from_id as from, to_id as to, amount / 1e18 as amount FROM transfer WHERE "timestamp" BETWEEN  $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 100

WITH daily_balances AS NOT MATERIALIZED (
  SELECT
    t.timestamp :: date as date,
    account_id,
    (
      array_agg(
        balance
        ORDER BY
          t.id DESC
      )
    ) [1] as balance,
    SUM (
      CASE
        WHEN direction = 'FROM' THEN - t.amount
        WHEN direction = 'TO' THEN t.amount
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) as change
  FROM
    account_transfer
    LEFT JOIN transfer as t ON transfer_id = t.id
  GROUP BY
    date,
    account_id
  ORDER BY
    date
),
daily_changes AS NOT MATERIALIZED (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM (
      CASE
        WHEN balance > 0
        AND change = balance THEN 1
        WHEN balance = 0 AND change < 0 THEN -1
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) as daily_change
  FROM
    daily_balances
  GROUP BY
    date
)
SELECT
  date,
  daily_change,
  SUM(daily_change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
      AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS holders
FROM
  daily_changes
ORDER BY
  date DESC

SELECT
  date,
  SUM(amount) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
      AND CURRENT ROW
  ) as vesting
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(
        CASE
          WHEN t.type = 'TRANSFER' AND a.type = 'VESTING' THEN amount
          WHEN t.type = 'RELEASE' THEN -amount
          ELSE 0
        END
      ) / 1e18 as amount
    FROM
      transfer as t
      JOIN account as a ON a.id = t.to_id
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as t
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  SUM(amount) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
      AND CURRENT ROW
  ) as bonded
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(
        CASE
          WHEN t.type = 'DEPOSIT' AND af.type = 'VESTING' THEN amount
          WHEN t.type = 'WITHDRAW' AND at.type = 'VESTING' THEN -amount
          ELSE 0
        END
      ) / 1e18 as amount
    FROM
      transfer as t
      JOIN account as af ON af.id = t.from_id
      JOIN account as at ON at.id = t.to_id
    WHERE worker_id IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as t
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  SUM(amount) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
      AND CURRENT ROW
  ) as delegated
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(
        CASE
          WHEN t.type = 'DEPOSIT' AND af.type = 'VESTING' THEN amount
          WHEN t.type = 'WITHDRAW' AND at.type = 'VESTING' THEN -amount
          ELSE 0
        END
      ) / 1e18 as amount
    FROM
      transfer as t
      JOIN account as af ON af.id = t.from_id
      JOIN account as at ON at.id = t.to_id
    WHERE delegation_id IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as t
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  SUM(amount) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
      AND CURRENT ROW
  ) as released
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(amount) / 1e18 as amount
    FROM
      transfer as t
    WHERE type = 'RELEASE'
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as t
ORDER BY
  date

WITH filtered_events AS (
  SELECT
    t.timestamp :: date AS event_date,
    CASE
      WHEN t.type = 'DEPOSIT' THEN t.amount
      WHEN t.type = 'WITHDRAW' THEN - t.amount
      ELSE 0
    END AS change_value
  FROM
    transfer t
  WHERE
    type in ('DEPOSIT', 'WITHDRAW')
),
daily_changes AS (
  SELECT
    event_date,
    SUM(change_value) / 1e18 AS daily_change
  FROM
    filtered_events
  WHERE
    event_date IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    event_date
)
SELECT
  event_date AS date,
  daily_change,
  SUM(daily_change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      event_date
  ) AS tvl
FROM
  daily_changes
ORDER BY
  event_date;

WITH filtered_events AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(
      wsc.timestamp,
      LAG(wsc.timestamp) OVER (
        PARTITION BY wsc.worker_id 
        ORDER BY wsc.block_number 
        ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING
      )
    )::date AS event_date,
    CASE 
      WHEN wsc.status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1
      WHEN wsc.status = 'DEREGISTERED' THEN -1
      ELSE 0
    END AS change_value
  FROM worker_status_change wsc
  WHERE wsc.pending = false
),
daily_changes AS (
  SELECT 
    event_date,
    SUM(change_value) AS daily_change
  FROM filtered_events
  WHERE event_date IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY event_date
)
SELECT 
  event_date AS date,
  daily_change,
  SUM(daily_change) OVER (
    ORDER BY event_date
    ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS active_workers
FROM daily_changes
ORDER BY event_date;

SELECT
  timestamp :: date as date,
  count(DISTINCT worker_id) as online
FROM
  worker_metrics
WHERE
  uptime > 0
  AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  change as daily_change,
  SUM(change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      date,
      sum(
        CASE
          WHEN workers_count > 0
          AND change = workers_count THEN 1
          WHEN workers_count <= 0 AND change < 0 THEN -1
          ELSE 0
        END
      ) as change
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          date,
          owner_id,
          change,
          sum(change) OVER (
            PARTITION BY owner_id
            ORDER BY
              date
          ) as workers_count
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              timestamp :: date as date,
              owner_id,
              sum(
                CASE
                  WHEN status = 'REGISTERING' THEN 1
                  WHEN status = 'WITHDRAWN' THEN -1
                END
              ) as change
            FROM
              (
                SELECT
                  wsc.id,
                  wsc.timestamp,
                  w.owner_id,
                  wsc.status
                FROM
                  worker_status_change as wsc
                  JOIN worker as w ON w.id = wsc.worker_id
                WHERE
                  wsc.status IN ('REGISTERING', 'WITHDRAWN')
                ORDER BY
                  wsc.id ASC
              ) as events
            GROUP BY
              date,
              owner_id
          ) as a
      ) as b
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as c
ORDER BY
  date

WITH filtered_events AS (
  SELECT 
    wsc.timestamp::date AS event_date,
    CASE 
      WHEN wsc.status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1
      WHEN wsc.status = 'WITHDRAWN' THEN -1
      ELSE 0
    END AS change_value
  FROM delegation_status_change wsc
  WHERE wsc.pending = false
),
daily_changes AS (
  SELECT 
    event_date,
    SUM(change_value) AS daily_change
  FROM filtered_events
  WHERE event_date IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY event_date
)
SELECT 
  event_date AS date,
  daily_change,
  SUM(daily_change) OVER (
    ORDER BY event_date
    ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS delegations
FROM daily_changes
ORDER BY event_date;

SELECT
  date,
  change as daily_change,
  SUM(change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      date,
      sum(
        CASE
          WHEN workers_count > 0
          AND change = workers_count THEN 1
          WHEN workers_count <= 0 AND change < 0 THEN -1
          ELSE 0
        END
      ) as change
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          date,
          owner_id,
          change,
          sum(change) OVER (
            PARTITION BY owner_id
            ORDER BY
              date
          ) as workers_count
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              timestamp :: date as date,
              owner_id,
              sum(
                CASE
                  WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1
                  WHEN status = 'WITHDRAWN' THEN -1
                  ELSE 0
                END
              ) as change
            FROM
              (
                SELECT
                  wsc.id,
                  wsc.timestamp,
                  w.owner_id,
                  wsc.status
                FROM
                  delegation_status_change as wsc
                  JOIN delegation as w ON w.id = wsc.delegation_id
                WHERE
                  wsc.status IN ('ACTIVE', 'WITHDRAWN')
                ORDER BY
                  wsc.id ASC
              ) as events
            GROUP BY
              date,
              owner_id
          ) as a
      ) as b
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as c
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  timestamp::date as day,
  COALESCE(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY apr), 0) as worker_apr,
  COALESCE(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY staker_apr), 0) as staker_apr
FROM worker_reward 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) 
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day;

SELECT
  day,
  CAST(SUM(worker_reward) / 1e18 AS double precision) AS worker_reward,
  CAST(SUM(delegation_reward) / 1e18 AS double precision) AS delegation_reward
FROM (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS day,
    SUM(amount) AS worker_reward,
    0 AS delegation_reward
  FROM (SELECT * FROM worker_reward WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()) as wr
  GROUP BY day

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS day,
    0 AS worker_reward,
    SUM(amount) AS delegation_reward
  FROM (SELECT * FROM delegation_reward WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()) as dr
  GROUP BY day
) sub
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day;

SELECT
  date,
  sum (change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date
  ) as claimed
FROM
(
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(amount) / 1e18 as change
    FROM
      transfer
    WHERE
      type = 'CLAIM'
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as daily
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  sum (change) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      date
  ) as rewarded
FROM
(
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      sum(amount + stakers_reward) / 1e18 as change
    FROM
      worker_reward
    GROUP BY
      date
  ) as daily
ORDER BY
  date
SELECT timestamp::date as date, type, count(*) FROM transfer WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) GROUP BY date, type ORDER BY date

SELECT
  timestamp :: date as date,
  count(DISTINCT account_id)
from
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp,
      from_id as account_id
    FROM
      transfer
    UNION
    ALL
    SELECT
      timestamp,
      to_id as account_id
    FROM
      transfer
  ) as t
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY
  date
ORDER BY
  date

SELECT
  timestamp :: date as date,
  sum(queries) as daily_change
FROM
  worker_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY
  date

SELECT
  timestamp :: date as date,
  sum(served_data) as daily_change
FROM
  worker_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY
  date

SELECT
  date,
  sum(stored_data)
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      timestamp :: date as date,
      worker_id,
      max(stored_data) as stored_data
    FROM
      worker_metrics
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    GROUP BY
      date,
      worker_id
  ) as w
GROUP BY
  date
